Create a YAML file for the MIP scenario based on GenX input files and a template

Source: R/yaml.R
mip_import_yaml.Rd

The function scans through PowerGenome/GenX yaml files for mip case settings and creates a new YAML file with the specified parameters for the MIP case/scenario.

Usage

mip_import_yaml(
  genx_dir,
  usensys_dir = file.path(genx_dir, "usensys"),
  yaml_file = "mip_case.yml",
  case_id = NULL,
  case_description = NULL,
  print_level = 1,
  update = TRUE,
  overwrite = FALSE
)

Arguments

genx_dir

character: The path to the GenX input folder

yaml_file

character: The name of the YAML file to create

print_level

numeric: The print level (0: no print, 1: print, 2: verbose)
